00090 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccCurve : public CIccTag
00091 {
00092 public:
00093   CIccCurve() {}
00094   virtual CIccTag *NewCopy() const { return new CIccCurve; } 
00095   virtual ~CIccCurve() {}
00096 
00097   virtual void DumpLut(std::string &sDescription, const icChar *szName,
00098     icColorSpaceSignature csSig, int nIndex) {}
00099 
00100   virtual void Begin() {}
00101   virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) { return v; }
00102 
00103   icFloatNumber Find(icFloatNumber v) { return Find(v, 0, Apply(0), 1.0, Apply(1.0)); }
00104   virtual bool IsIdentity() {return false;}
00105 
00106 protected:
00107   icFloatNumber Find(icFloatNumber v,
00108     icFloatNumber p0, icFloatNumber v0,
00109     icFloatNumber p1, icFloatNumber v1);
00110 
00111 };
00112 typedef CIccCurve* LPIccCurve;
00113 
00114 typedef enum {
00115   icInitNone,
00116   icInitZero,
00117   icInitIdentity,
00118 } icTagCurveSizeInit;

00127 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagCurve : public CIccCurve
00128 {
00129 public:
00130   CIccTagCurve(int nSize=0);
00131   CIccTagCurve(const CIccTagCurve &ITCurve);
00132   CIccTagCurve &operator=(const CIccTagCurve &CurveTag);
00133   virtual CIccTag *NewCopy() const { return new CIccTagCurve(*this);}
00134   virtual ~CIccTagCurve();
00135 
00136   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigCurveType; }
00137   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagCurve"; }
00138 
00139   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00140   virtual void DumpLut(std::string &sDescription, const icChar *szName, 
00141     icColorSpaceSignature csSig, int nIndex);
00142 
00143   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00144   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00145 
00146   icFloatNumber &operator[](icUInt32Number index) {return m_Curve[index];}
00147   icFloatNumber *GetData(icUInt32Number index) {return &m_Curve[index];}
00148   icUInt32Number GetSize() const { return m_nSize; }
00149   void SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, icTagCurveSizeInit nSizeOpt=icInitZero);
00150   void SetGamma(icFloatNumber gamma);
00151 
00152   virtual void Begin() {m_nMaxIndex = (icUInt16Number)m_nSize - 1;}
00153   virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v);
00154   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00155   virtual bool IsIdentity();
00156 
00157 protected:
00158   icFloatNumber *m_Curve;
00159   icUInt32Number m_nSize;
00160   icUInt16Number m_nMaxIndex;
00161 };

00262 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccCLUT
00263 {
00264 public:
00265   CIccCLUT(icUInt8Number nInputChannels, icUInt16Number nOutputChannels, icUInt8Number nPrecision=2);
00266   CIccCLUT(const CIccCLUT &ICLUT);
00267   CIccCLUT &operator=(const CIccCLUT &CLUTClass);
00268   virtual ~CIccCLUT();
00269 
00270   bool Init(icUInt8Number nGridPoints);
00271   bool Init(icUInt8Number *pGridPoints);
00272 
00273   bool ReadData(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO, icUInt8Number nPrecision);
00274   bool WriteData(CIccIO *pIO, icUInt8Number nPrecision);
00275 
00276   bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00277   bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00278 
00279   void DumpLut(std::string  &sDescription, const icChar *szName,
00280                icColorSpaceSignature csInput, icColorSpaceSignature csOutput,
00281                bool bUseLegacy=false);
00282 
00283   icFloatNumber& operator[](int index) { return m_pData[index]; }
00284   icFloatNumber* GetData(int index) { return &m_pData[index]; }
00285   icUInt32Number NumPoints() const { return m_nNumPoints; }
00286   icUInt8Number GridPoints() const { return m_GridPoints[0]; }
00287   icUInt8Number GridPoint(int index) const { return m_GridPoints[index]; }
00288   icUInt32Number MaxGridPoint(int index) const { return m_MaxGridPoint[index]; }
00289 
00290   icUInt32Number GetDimSize(icUInt8Number nIndex) const { return m_DimSize[nIndex]; }
00291 
00292   icUInt8Number GetInputDim() const { return m_nInput; }
00293   icUInt16Number GetOutputChannels() const { return m_nOutput; }
00294 
00295   icUInt32Number GetNumOffset() const { return m_nNodes; }
00296   icUInt32Number GetOffset(int index) const { return m_nOffset ? m_nOffset[index] : 0; }
00297 
00298 
00299   void Begin();
00300   void Interp3dTetra(icFloatNumber *destPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00301   void Interp3d(icFloatNumber *destPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00302   void Interp4d(icFloatNumber *destPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00303   void Interp5d(icFloatNumber *destPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00304   void Interp6d(icFloatNumber *destPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00305   void InterpND(icFloatNumber *destPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00306 
00307   void Iterate(IIccCLUTExec* pExec);
00308   icValidateStatus Validate(icTagTypeSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL)  const;
00309 
00310   void SetClipFunc(icCLUTCLIPFUNC ClipFunc) { UnitClip = ClipFunc; }
00311 
00312   icUInt8Number GetPrecision() { return m_nPrecision; }
00313 
00314 protected:
00315   void Iterate(std::string &sDescription, icUInt8Number nIndex, icUInt32Number nPos, bool bUseLegacy=false);
00316   void SubIterate(IIccCLUTExec* pExec, icUInt8Number nIndex, icUInt32Number nPos);
00317 
00318   icCLUTCLIPFUNC UnitClip;
00319 
00320   icUInt8Number m_nReserved2[3];
00321   
00322   icUInt8Number m_nInput;
00323   icUInt16Number m_nOutput; //16 bit to support MPE CLUT elements
00324   icUInt8Number m_nPrecision;
00325 
00326   icUInt8Number m_GridPoints[16];
00327   icUInt32Number m_nNumPoints;
00328 
00329   icUInt32Number m_DimSize[16];
00330   icFloatNumber *m_pData;
00331 
00332   //Iteration temporary variables
00333   icUInt8Number m_GridAdr[16];
00334   icFloatNumber m_fGridAdr[16];
00335   icChar *m_pOutText, *m_pVal;
00336   icColorSpaceSignature m_csInput, m_csOutput;
00337 
00338   //Tetrahedral interpolation variables
00339   icUInt8Number m_MaxGridPoint[16];
00340   icUInt32Number n000, n001, n010, n011, n100, n101, n110, n111, n1000, n10000, n100000;
00341 
00342   //ND Interpolation
00343   icUInt32Number *m_nOffset;
00344   // Temporary ND Interp Variables
00345   icFloatNumber *m_g, *m_s, *m_df;
00346   icUInt32Number* m_ig;
00347   icUInt32Number m_nNodes, m_nPower[16];
00348 };

00359 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccMBB : public CIccTag
00360 {
00361   friend class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccXform3DLut;
00362   friend class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccXform4DLut;
00363   friend class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccXformNDLut;
00364 public:
00365   CIccMBB();
00366   CIccMBB(const CIccMBB &IMBB);
00367   CIccMBB &operator=(const CIccMBB &IMBB);
00368   virtual CIccTag* NewCopy() const {return new CIccMBB(*this);}
00369   virtual ~CIccMBB();
00370 
00371   virtual bool IsMBBType() { return true;}
00372 
00373   virtual icUInt8Number GetPrecision() { return 2; }
00374   virtual bool IsInputMatrix() { return m_bInputMatrix; } //Is matrix on input side of CLUT?
00375   virtual bool UseLegacyPCS() const { return false; } //Treat Lab Encoding differently?
00376 
00377   bool IsInputB() { return IsInputMatrix(); }
00378   bool SwapMBCurves() { return m_bUseMCurvesAsBCurves; }
00379 
00380   void Cleanup();
00381   void Init(icUInt8Number nInputChannels, icUInt8Number nOutputChannels);
00382 
00383   icUInt8Number InputChannels() const { return m_nInput; }
00384   icUInt8Number OutputChannels() const { return m_nOutput; }
00385 
00386   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00387 
00388   virtual void SetColorSpaces(icColorSpaceSignature csInput, icColorSpaceSignature csOutput);
00389   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL);
00390 
00391   LPIccCurve* NewCurvesA();
00392   CIccCLUT*   NewCLUT(icUInt8Number nGridPoints, icUInt8Number nPrecision=2);
00393   CIccCLUT*   NewCLUT(icUInt8Number *pGridPoints, icUInt8Number nPrecision=2);
00394   CIccMatrix* NewMatrix();
00395   LPIccCurve* NewCurvesM();
00396   LPIccCurve* NewCurvesB();
00397 
00398   CIccMatrix *GetMatrix() const  {return m_Matrix; }
00399   CIccCLUT   *GetCLUT() const    {return m_CLUT;}
00400   LPIccCurve *GetCurvesA() const {return m_CurvesA;}
00401   LPIccCurve *GetCurvesB() const {return m_CurvesB;}
00402   LPIccCurve *GetCurvesM() const {return m_CurvesM;}
00403 
00404   CIccCLUT *SetCLUT(CIccCLUT *clut);
00405 
00406 protected:
00407   bool m_bInputMatrix;
00408   bool m_bUseMCurvesAsBCurves;
00409 
00410   icUInt8Number m_nInput;
00411   icUInt8Number m_nOutput;
00412 
00413   icColorSpaceSignature m_csInput;
00414   icColorSpaceSignature m_csOutput;
00415 
00416   LPIccCurve *m_CurvesA;
00417   CIccCLUT  *m_CLUT;
00418   CIccMatrix *m_Matrix;
00419   LPIccCurve *m_CurvesM;
00420   LPIccCurve *m_CurvesB;
00421 
00422 };
